name: movies_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool streamlinewatch_streaming_guide.
Tool description: StreamlineWatch's streaming guide APIs for Movies and Shows
API description: Fetch metadata for a specified movie from a given platform and region using the RapidAPI service.

platform.description:
Retrieve sources from the specified platform.
*required, possible values: ios, android, androidtv, web*

is_id.description: The ID of the movie. You can also use a TMDb ID.

region.description:
Retrieve the sources' deep link from this region
*optional, default: US*
*possible values: US, FR*
